org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class Graphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.Graphics

  • public class Graphics
extends Object
    Implements graphics rendering functionality
    Author:
    Thomas Cashman

      • setClip

        public void setClip(float x,
           float y,
           float width,
           float height)

        Parameters:

        y - The y coordinate the clip begins at
        width - The width of the clip
        height - The height of the clip
